targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_dropped")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("rate_tp_hits") FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE  ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("num_buffer_cleanups") FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("num_payloads_overwritten") FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE  ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.readout.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}_${readout_app}.${readout_module}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.description: Group this by source_id for different e_links

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_chunks_processed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.flxlibs.felixcardreaderinfo.ELinkInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /${partition}_.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

panels.title: Felix rates
